sentences.en: A painting, photograph, or a ceramic vase represent [ sic ] final solutions.
sentences.cn: 一幅画 、 一张照片, 或是一件 瓷器 花瓶都已经是最终的答案.

sentences.en: But the oxidation of RB - SiC does't affect largely on its electric conduction.
sentences.cn: 氧化过程对 反应烧结 碳化硅材料的导电性能影响不大.

sentences.en: Commonly used bearing material has SiC ceramics, graphite, PTFE, such as filling.
sentences.cn: 常用的轴承材料有碳化硅陶瓷 、 石墨 、 填充聚四氟乙烯等.

sentences.en: Fixed - seal & rotational - seal are made of various msterials, SIC, Carbon, Ceramic and can withstand various chemicals.
sentences.cn: 固定环 及 转动环由各种不同材质, SIC, 碳素, 陶瓷制成,可承受各种不同的化学药水.

sentences.en: In the mud -- En ange e il mondo ! [ sic ] ( 6 )
Optimizing fabrication technology, we got hemispherical SiC single crystal with radial size is 2 cm.
sentences.cn: 通过优化生长工艺, 制备得到了径向尺寸大于2cm的半球状SiC单晶体.

sentences.en: Several criteria such as AIC and SIC are usually used in ARMA model selection.
sentences.cn: AIC与SIC等 准则函数方法是ARMA模型选择过程中经常使用的方法.

sentences.en: SiC is a kind of special ceramic with outstanding properties, widely used in industry.
sentences.cn: SiC是一种有着许多优良性能的重要特种陶瓷, 在许多领域得到了广泛的应用.

sentences.en: The continuous SiC fibers coated with B 4 C using chemical vapour deposition ( CVD ) were made.
sentences.cn: 采用化学气相沉积 ( CVD ) 方法,在连续SiC纤维 表面沉积一层B4C涂层.

sentences.en: The main ingredients of the slime were SiC powder, EPS powder, Cr - Fe powder, auxiliary infiltration agent and binder, etc.
sentences.cn: 料浆主要组成为SiC粉 、 EPS粉 、 Cr -Fe 粉 、 助渗剂、粘结剂等.

sentences.en: The results that the addition of Si enhances wettability of Al - SiC are achieved byXRD, SEM, EDS analysis ect.
sentences.cn: 并运用XRD 、 SEM 、 EDS等方法分析和探讨了Si对改善Al - SiC润湿性的作用机理.

sentences.en: The unstable conduction nonlinearity of abrasive SiC brings the difficulty grading of generator stator coil end.
sentences.cn: 磨料SiC微 粉电学性能不稳定,给发电机定子线圈端部防晕带来了极大困难.

sentences.cn: 磨料SiC粉料 电学性能不稳定,给发电机定子线圈端部防晕带来了极大困难.

sentences.en: We had seen several signs that said ‘ORANGE’S (sic) FOR SALE’.
sentences.cn: 我们看到好几个写着 ORANGE’S（原文如此）FOR SALE 的牌子。
